got to be said

Read in the news papers recently that by the year 2025 if you white and British and living in this country then you,ll be in the minority and living in a muslim state , the war in iraq and afghanistan will still be going on and the number of our brave soldiers killed will be in the thousands and not hundreds.
don,t know about you people out there but that can,t be allowed to happen.
its time the government and Royalty for that matter to sort this out. its time to bring our boys home and let those people kill themselves and not our boys.
place our soldiers at the ports and airports , close all our borders and kick out all asylum seekers and forigen scroungers oops sorry forigen workers and and allow no more forignners to abuse our national health system and get no more free housing , free money and a free life here. bring back our country to the people it truely belongs to the British. may be then this country can get back to the once great country it once was.

2 truck drivers

Two truck drivers were stood waiting at the channel tunnel on nthe french side of the channel talking
1st truck driver said its took me 12 hours to drive here from Dressden in Germany.
The 2nd truck driver said my brother use to go there drop his load and be back in 6 hours.
the first driver said wow thats real fast how did he manage that ?
2nd driver said he flew Lancaster bombers ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !

7 Dwarfs

The 7 dwarfs go to the vatican to see the pope.
They walk in and they say
Go on Dopey ask him ask him
so Dopey says your grace are there nuns in the antartic ?
yes came the reply.
then the dwarfs said
go on Dopey ask him ask him
so Dopey says yor grace are there black nuns in the antartic?
yes came the reply.
then again the dwarfs say
go on Dopey ask him ask him
so Dopey says your grace are there dwarf nuns in the antartic?
no came the reply
then again came the words
go on Dopey ask him ask him
so Dopey says your grace are there black dwarf nuns in the ant artic ?
no came the reply

the 6 dwarfs then started singing and laughing

Dopey shagged a penguin
Dopey shagged a penguin
hehehehehehehehehehehe

2 Blondes

2 blondes working in a field.
the 1st blonde dug a hole then the 2nd blonde filled it in again.
a man was stood behind a hedge watching this
and after about half an hour heasked the 2 blondes
why is one of you digging a hole and then the other fills it in again ???

the 1st blonde replied we,re planting trees but the man that
puts the tree in the hole isn,t here today !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

the dog

howdee stranger says the barman
what can i do for you? he says
the dog replies
Am looking for ma paw ! !

Bit of Laugh

A man sat at the bar and after a night of drinking
gets up and falls flat on his face
Thinking that it was now time to get home he tries to get up
but again falls flat on his face.
Thinking that he,d had more to drink than he should
he crawls on hands and knees to the door grabs hold of the door frame
and tries to pull himself up onto his feet
Yet again he falls flat on his face.
At this point he gives up and crawls al the way home were he
subsequently falls fast asleep on the doorstep
Next morning his wife opens the door and finds him there
She just says you went to the pub last night and got drunk didn,t you
Yes the man replied but how do you know i went to the pub ? he asked his wife

she just replied

YOU LEFT YA WHEELCHAIR THERE !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

You just never know

A couple were making love in her bedroom
When the man glances over
and see,s the photo of a man
on the bedside cabinet.

is that your husband ? he asks her.

she looks into his eyes and replys
No thats not my husband

Is that your boyfriend then ? the man asks

She looks him in the eyes and replys
No thats not my boyfriend.

Is it your brother then ? the man asks

She again looks him in the eyes and replys
No thats not my brother.

Well who the hell is it ? the man asks.

She again looks him in the eyes
and simply replys

That was me 6 months ago ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! ! !

Doctor

A man with 70% burns was in hospital
and the doctor had just checked on him.

The doctor turned to the nurse and said
Give the patient 2 viagra tablets nurse .

The nurse looked at the doctor with a surprised
look on her face and said

But doctor will that help the patients recovery ?

No said the doctor but it,ll help keep the sheets off his legs ! ! ! !

the Drunk

A drunken man who smelled like beer sat down on a subway next to a Priest.

The man's tie was stained; his face was plastered with red lipstick, and a half empty bottle of gin was sticking out of his torn coat pocket.

He opened his newspaper and began reading. After a few minutes the man turned to the priest and asked, 'say Father, what causes Arthritis?'

The priest wanting to teach this man a little lesson replies, 'my son, it's caused by loose living, being with cheap, wicked women, too much alcohol, contempt for your fellow man, sleeping around with prostitutes & lack of a bath'.

The drunk muttered in response, 'Well, I'll be damned,' then returned to his paper.

The priest, thinking about what he had said, nudged the man and apologized 'I'm very sorry. I didn't mean to come on so strong. How long have you had arthritis?'

The drunk answered, 'I don't have it, Father. I was just reading here that the Pope does.'

Political Correctness

Subject: Political Correctness (Australian Version)
T. B. Bechtel, a City Councilor from Newcastle , Australia , was asked on a local live radio talk show, just what he thought about the allegations of torture of suspected terrorists. His reply prompted his ejection from the studio, but to thunderous applause from the audience.

HIS STATEMENT:

"If hooking up one raghead terrorist prisoner's testicles to a car battery to get the truth out of the lying little camelshagger will save just one Australian life, then I have only three things to say: 'Red is positive, black is negative, and make sure his nuts are wet'

What is it with this country

Why is it that we,re told by the government that our country is having economic difficulties therefore we can,t afford to send our troops to iraq and afghanistan without the correct equipment and to afford to send the chinouke helicopters we have to close 1 or more RAF bases yet when some outback country that has absolutly nothing to do with us has a bit of an earth tremour we can suddenly send them £20 million YES £20 million pounds worth of aid now that does really take the piss.
Now last year sevral parts of the country had severe floods and people made homeless and what did they get virtually nothing and some of them are still strugling to this day.
So i guess theres something drastically wrong here it should be a case of sod them let other countrys give them the money and let that 20 million be put to a greater and more worthwhile cause and lets get this country and our soldiers sorted first and let others worry about the outback countries after all they do sod all for us ! ! ! !

Duck and the Barman

A Duck walks into a bar and asks the barman

You got any bread ?

The barman says no.

The Duck says

you got any bread ?

The barman again says no

The Duck says again

You got any Bread ?

The barmans says look you ask me that one more time
and am gonna nail your beak to this bar ! !

The Ducks says

You got any nails ?

The barman says no.

The Duck says

You got any bread ? ? ? ? ? ?
